definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: sink or drop down, languish, wither and fall, fade (NH id.; As. nabâlu, destroy, Dl:HWB 443 f. Ar. nabala v, VIII. die; Aram. [[נְבֵילָא]] corpse);—

sink or drop down, fr. exhaustion [[נׇבׂל תִּכּׂל]] Ex 18:18 (Moses and Isr.); fr. discouragement 2Sa 22:46 = Ps 18:46 (of foreigners, foes of Isr.); of mt. [[הַר־נׁפֵל יִבּוֹל]] Job 14:18 (but [[נׇפוֹל יִפּוֹל]] Lag:Proph. Chald. Siegf Baer, after LXX, so Bu [or [[יִבְלֶה]]]; Du [[נׇבוֹל יִכּוֹל]]).

usu. fall like a leaf, or flower wither and fall, fade: [[כְּאֵלָה נׁבֶ֫לֶת עָלֶֽהָ]] Is 1:30 like an oak falling as to it leaves (sim. of people of Jerus.); the host of heaven [[יִבּוֹל כִּנְבׂל עָלֶה]] [[מגֶּפֶן וּכְנׁבֶלֶת מִתְּאֵנׇה]] Is 34:4; [[עָלֵהוּ]] ´[[לאׁ יִבּ]] Ez Eze 47:12 (trees in Ezek.'s vision), so fig. of good man Ps 1:3; of Isr. Je 8:13, [[וַנׇּ֫בֶל כֶּעָלֶה]] Is 64:5; also [[נׇבֵל חִיץ]] Is 40:7, Is 40:8 (both ‖[[יׇבֵשׁ חָחִיר]]), [[חִיץ נׁבֵל]] Is 28:1, cf. v:Is 28:4; of wicked ´[[כְּיֶרֶק דֶּשֶׁא יִבּ]] Ps 37:2: (‖[[כֶּחָחִיר יִמָָּלוּ]]); of devastated earth [[אָֽבְלָה נׇֽבְלָה הָאָרֶַץ אֻמְלְלָה נׇֽבְלָה]] [[תֵּבֵָל]] Is 24:4.
